resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
What is your Favorite game you ever played?
What do you like to do on your spare time?
What has been your Best/Worst Date
Who is the messiest person you know?
What would you recommend for any Starting Streamer?
What would you like remembered about you?
What is one message you would give to your fans?
What is your Favorite Game to play?
Do you get used to be a celebrity?
Do you Speak any other languages.
My Brother , One Terrible Idea. He suggested me to stream to meet new people and play video games.
My Cat Bumbles. I Rescued him from the cold after he was hurt and nursed him back to health.
Kingdom Hearts, The First one PS1

It was kind of an accident, actually. I initially was trying to get my gameplay onto YouTube from my PS4, but at the time the PS4 only recorded up to 15 minutes at a time. But, my PS4 could stream to Twitch then, I streamed to Twitch, then downloaded the VOD to edit and upload to YouTube. After a while, I realized that I liked the live interaction way more than uploading to YouTube.

My favourite games to play are any game I can find kind of a small "feature" of and make that into the main theme of that stream. (Nutshots in Sniper Elite 4, dead horses in Red Dead Redemption 2, etc) and also games that really allow me to interact with the audience
Have to say my 2 cats, Milo and Oliver

Don\'t worry about numbers, expensive gear, or insane custom graphics. First figure out who you are as a streamer. Learn how to have a presence on screen first, then you can figure out graphics and gear to compliment your style of show. After that, then you can push for growth.
Spare time? What\'s that? LOL. I spend most of my spare time working on upgrading and improving my show. For every hour on cam, I spend at least double that working on improving it.
I have been happily married since 2010...to the same woman!

For a broadcaster to get my attention, either be unique or be one of the best at what they do. Another important thing is that it shouldn\'t be the game that makes the stream, it should be the braodcaster
No, even if I was single
I don\'t think of myself as even remotely famous, so it\'s weird to me when people I don\'t know come up to me and go "Hey Crash, I'm [insert name here]".
Markiplier, hands down. He was my inspiration to seriously pursue content creation.
Just like Dallas Corbin, I speak English and Bad English
You are the reason I\'m here and the reason I do this. Thank you.
